author: Will Goodbody
title: Insurers agree measures to ease Covid-19 burden
description: The insurance industry has announced a suite of measures aimed at helping personal and business customers through the difficulties posed by the Covid-19 pandemic.
content:
The insurance industry has announced a suite of measures aimed at helping personal and business customers through the difficulties posed by the Covid-19 pandemic.
They include a reduction in premiums for business customers that will reflect the reduced level… [+4902 chars]
